features.title: Weekly Budget Tracker
features.description: Set simple spending limits for gas, groceries, dining, shopping, and more, with automatic updates as you log purchases.

features.title: Retirement Planning
features.description: Set long-term savings goals and monitor projected growth toward financial independence.

features.title: Savings Goals
features.description: Create savings buckets—like Roth IRA, emergency fund, or vacation—and watch your progress grow with clean, easy-to-read visuals.

features.title: Debt Payoff
features.description: Track balances, payment progress, and estimated payoff dates to stay motivated and see how each week gets you closer to financial freedom.
